segments.text: Ugh, what a gross mess with water spilling all over the kitchen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The sink is clogged or something, letting filthy water overflow everywhere.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: That woman is drying a plate while standing in the slop – nasty.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her apron's probably getting soaked, and she doesn't even care.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The puddle on the floor looks slippery and unclean.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Now, those kids digging into the cookie jar with dirty hands.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy's balancing precariously, but that's not stopping the grubbiness.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl reaching up – who knows if they've washed their hands.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water streaming down the cabinets; it'll warp and smell musty soon.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The whole scene is just revolting, with hazards and filth mixing.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Outside, the garden is pristine, making the inside look even worse.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't stand watching this disgusting domestic disaster.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Someone clean this up before it gets any uglier.
segments.speaker: PAR
